name: Sunset Over Imdahl
storyline: You play as Lohn, a young boy who is the sole survivor of the siege. Wandering the streets in desperation, Lohn meets a nobly-dressed man who offers him a chance to bring his hometown back to life. Without knowing his intentions, Lohn accepts on the man's offer, and the game begins.
summary: Sunset Over Imdahl is a non-battle RPG that takes place in a city under siege.
